categories.title: Bastien Faisant
categories.description: Student in the third year of computer engineering school at ESIR, inRennes, I am looking, as part of my training, for an end-of-yearinternship in the field of computer science, lasting 4 to 6 months to be carried out from March 4, 2024.

entities.title: React Web Developer (Internship)
entities.description:
The aim of my internship with Flyx Cloud was to develop a frontend solution for a white-label order management web application for retail companies.
At the end of my internship, the proposed product presents the overall flow of an order management system, from the display of the store menu to the online payment of the basket.

entities.title: White-label web-based order management solution
entities.description: Front-end web application in React with the Next.js framework. Interactionwith the backend developed in .NET.

entities.title: Evaluation of young football players in data engineering
entities.description: Data retrieval via web scraping (BeautifulSoup and Selenium WebDriver) andPandas and Numpy for processing.

entities.title: Peer-to-peer mobile gaming application
entities.description: Flutter application for single and multiplayer challenges over Wi-Fi P2P.

entities.title: Dockerized microservices of an association manager
entities.description: Architecture using NestJS, MySQL, Angular, Quarkus, RabbitMQ and Nginx.

entities.title: Development of a compiler for new programming language While in C++
entities.description: Compiler using ANTLR and Java to create a grammar lexer and parser, threeaddress code and runtime library for C++.

entities.title: Creation of a web application for managing training schedules
entities.description: Frontend web application in Flutter/Dart, API in NodeJS with the NestJSframework and database hosted in MongoDB.

entities.title: Mobile application for signposting and cleaning up illegal dumping
entities.description: Android development in Java/XML with Android Studio and Visual Studio Codetools. Hosting of our database in Firebase.

entities.school: ESIR - Rennes Graduate School of Engineering
ESIR - Rennes Graduate School of Engineering
